name: HumanCharityCoin
description: Human-Charity-Coin Core is a decentralized, peer-to-peer cryptocurrency with a primary focus on energy-efficiency and scalabilty. The Human-Charity-Coin Network makes use of only Proof-of-Stake mining, in the form of masternodes and staking. This means that the Human-Charity-Coin blockchain has a very low impact on the environment and ensures that scaling will be a smooth transition in future.
